DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of the study is to assess the long-term safety of dupilumab in pediatric patients with AD. The secondary objectives of the study are: - To assess the long-term efficacy of dupilumab in pediatric patients with AD - To assess the trough concentrations of functional dupilumab in serum and the immunogenicity in pediatric patients with AD after re-treatment with dupilumab.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Assess the Long-term Safety of Dupilumab (REGN668/SAR231893) Administered in Patients 6 to <18 Year of Age With Atopic Dermatitis (AD)
